website_summaries.verdict: This 2 liter grinder is a bit of a challenge to clean but produces excellent, consistent results for grinding rice, nut butters and dahl ingredients.
pros: Stainless Steel drum and food grade plastic components
Includes coconut scraper and atta kneader
Grinds and pulses, rice and beans for traditional foods
Stone grinders on stone base for excellent grinding

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table Top Wet Grinder
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best product from Premier. The Table Top Wet Grinder is compact and very easy to use. It is grinding fast and within 15-20 mins the idle/dosa batter is ready. It looks really nice and designed well. Also, I have called Premier before making the purchase, they were very friendly answering my questions. Overall it is really good purchase and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Venkat

customer_reviews.title: I liked the following things so far - We have used ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the following things so far - We have used Butterfly for the last 18 years and so needed a replacement - The customer service was prompt, The lid of the product shipped was cut. I emailed SS Premier and immediately got a replacement lid without any problems. - The grinder is quieter compared to the Butterfly model - The grinder is more efficient and able to grind in 25 to 30 minutes Dosa batter (enough for 8 persons) what would take 40-45 minutes with Butterfly for the same consistency. When new the Butterfly grinder would take about 35 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Indiresha ramachandra

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. It has only been 15 days since I bought it and so far I love it. Grinds rice, grains quickly and makes a smooth batter. Great for making dosa, idly batter. The grinding stone is not too heavy and easy to handle. I cannot comment about reliability yet, will update the review in a few months about reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin

customer_reviews.title: SS Premier Wet Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the grinder for 1 week now, and its been working great. The grinder came packaged very well. All parts were included as indicated by the seller. Since I have been using it only a week, there are no problems as of now. Will update this review in the future. So far it's looking like a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Thallam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Impressive grinder. I used it to grind idly batter and got a smooth batter. Prompt customer service who helped me get the grinder color of my choice. Thank you for the excellent product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Desi wet grinder
customer_reviews.text: Good wet grinder. But takes more time to make the batter. It would be good if the stone size is bit bigger, so it can grind fast. Super quiet and easy to work with with less great, I believe it has good ventilation. Best product at this price
customer_reviews.author: Ganesh K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grinder for a small family needs
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a good grinder and this is a perfect one for our family needs. Works very well. Customer care is really good as we received the product first which had slightly broken stone and it was replaced quickly based on email request sent.
customer_reviews.author: Ramprabhu Harikrishanan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Customer Service & Return
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I already owned one and unfortunately, needed to return my second purchase. Return went smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Eric Katz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were HAPPY with the product. It is as described.
customer_reviews.author: rama kale

customer_reviews.title: ... gear and bearing for tightening the stone will break easily.
customer_reviews.text: white gear and bearing for tightening the stone will break easily .
customer_reviews.author: V1

customer_reviews.title: But initial shipping screwed up.
customer_reviews.text: But initial shipping screwed up. Instead of buying Ultra we can go for premier which save 100 $ and worth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for dosa. Makes great rice noodles and corn masa.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few months, not just for dosa, but for grinding rice to make fresh rice noodles and for grinding corn to make masa for tortillas and tamales. I could not be more pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Fornaio

product_meta.title: Premier Compact Table Top Wet Grinder -110volts 2 Ltrs (Golden Olive Green)
product_meta.description: Why do your own wet grinding when there are so many commercially available batters, pastes, etc? It is because you control, hygiene, quality of ingredients, develop your unique flavor, and know it is freshly prepared for the health of your family and friends. The Premier Compact Grinder is a proven workhorse. This grinder is powerful in a small and compact space for a modern kitchen. The special high-quality hard roller stones on a stone base provide traditional wet grinding in a modern way. The innovative gear design provides the grinder the ability to grind and make a very fine batter in the shortest possible time without losing nutritional value. Protects nutrients: The grinding stone design is optimized to avoid over heating thus ensuring nutrients are protected resulting in a fluffy and soft dosa and Idli batter. Please purchase Premier Chocolate Refiner for chocolate and nut butter grinding purposes. This unique Table Top Wet Grinder lets you discover convenience and adds beauty to your kitchen. It is used for a wide variety of wet grinding applications, yielding pastes that form the base for delicious preparations around the world. It can also be used for pulping vegetables for soups, making semisolid masalas and chutneys. The grinder stone in Premier Wet Grinders is made of hard black; export quality, special hard stone that ensures no chipping or powdering during wet grinding applications ensuring a longer component life. All plastic components used in the grinder are made of food grade quality. The rotation of the grinder stone is optimized to avoid overheating in an effort to retain the micronutrients in the paste. The roller stone further crushes, mixes, pounds and grinds simultaneously, so that all the food is ground to exact proportions and is thoroughly mixed.
feature_bullets: Space Saving elegant unit for a modern day kitchen
High quality Stainless Steel drum and food grade plastic components. No BPA
110 Volts with Coconut Scrapper and Atta Kneader
Grind rice, pulses and beans to make dosa, idli, vada, urad, dokla, etc

Advanced technology: The double reduction gear drive provides years of service and does not reduce the performance of the machine compared to belt only drive machine.200 Watts high powered motor in 110Volts 60 hz for use in USA and Canada

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
